rukus.text: 15|63|avar (a dutanmaraya malakkukal) parannu: alla, etearu (siksayute) karyattil avar (janannal) sansayiccirunnuvea atum keantan nannal tankalute atutt vannirikkunnat‌
15|64|yathart'thyavum keantan nannal tankalute atutt vannirikkunnat‌. tirccayayum nannal satyam parayunnavarakunnu

15|65|atinal tankalute kutumbatteyum keant ratriyil alpasamayam bakkiyullappeal yatraceyt kealluka. tankal avarute pinnale anugamikkukayum ceyyuka. ninnalil oralum tirinn neakkarut‌. ninnal kalpikkappetunna bhagattekk natann peayikkealluka
15|66|a karyam, atayat prabhatamakunnateate ikkuttarute muratutanne muriccunikkappetunnatan enna karyam nam addehattin (lutv nabikk‌) khanditamayi ariyicc keatuttu
15|68|addeham (lutv‌) parannu: tirccayayum ivar enre atithikalan‌. atinal ninnalenne vasalakkarut‌
15|70|avar parannu: leakarute karyattil (itapetunnatil) ninnu ninne nannal vilakkiyittille
15|71|addeham parannu: ita enre penmakkal. (avare ninnalkk vivaham kalikkam.) ninnalkk ceyyam ennuntenkil
15|72|ninre jivitam tanneyana satyam tirccayayum avar avarute lahariyil viharikkukayayirunnu
15|74|annane a rajyatte nam talakilayi marikkukayum, cuttupalutta istikakkallukal avarute mel nam varsikkukayum ceytu
15|76|tirccayayum at (a rajyam) (innum) nilaninn varunna oru patayilan sthiti ceyyunnat‌
15|79|atinal nam avarute nere siksanatapati svikariccu. tirccayayum i rant pradesavum turanna patayil tanneyan sthiticeyyunnat‌
